title: Ottoman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill
- Lay siege to a target (Costs 5 gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target’s defense is ever too strong to kill, you will lay siege to your target.
- Sieges prevent your target from visiting.
- Sieges deal the target a Basic attack each night.
- While a target is under siege, they will lose one layer of defense each night. This applies at the start of each night.
- You may have a maximum of two sieges active at a time.
- If you have two sieges active, the Factional Kill is disabled until one ends.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were killed by an Ottoman Janissary.” (Factional Kill)
“They couldn’t withstand the Turkish bombard.” (Siege Kill)
“You were placed under siege!” (Target when siege is applied)
